name: Burglar's Pack
equipment: a backpack, a bag of 1000 ball bearings, 10ft of string, a bell, 5 candles, a crowbar, a hammer, 10 pitons, a hooded lantern, 2 flasks of oil, 5 days rations, a tinderbox, a waterskin, 50ft of hempen rope

name: Diplomat's Pack
equipment: a chest, 2 cases for maps and scrolls, a set of fine clothes, a bottle of ink, an ink pen, a lamp, 2 flasks of oil, 5 sheets of paper, a vial of perfume, sealing wax, soap

name: Dungeoneer's Pack
equipment: a backpack, a crowbar, a hammer, 10 pitons, 10 torches, a tinderbox, 10 days of rations, a waterskin, 50ft of hempen rope

name: Entertainers's Pack
equipment: a backpack, a bedroll, 2 costumes, 5 candles, 5 days of rations, a waterskin, a disguise kit

name: Explorer's Pack
equipment: a backpack, a bedroll, a mess kit, a tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, a waterskin, 50ft of hempen rope

name: Priest's Pack
equipment: a backpack, a blanket, 10 candles, a tinderbox, an alms box, 2 blocks of incense, a censer, vestments, 2 days of rations, a waterskin

name: Scholar's Pack
equipment: a backpack, a book of lore, a bottle of ink, an ink pen, 10 sheets of parchment, a little bag of sand, a small knife
